Q：英雄自選劵揀咩英好?
A：有愛>一切
依隻驚無勁唔勁，只有夾唔夾
同埋官方會因應英雄強弱而作出Buff同Nerf嘅調整
今個版本可能弱勢啲，但下個版本可能變神角都未定
所以不如揀咗有邊隻英係你真係鍾意嘅，想用嘅
再係Post度問下有咩組合可以夾佢，咁會比較好
相信各巴絲都好樂意為新手巴絲們解答的

Q：我抽到依樣嘢又唔係專武，咁係咩嚟?
A：Artifact
英文版：https://maskofgoblin.netlify.com
殘中版：http://bbs.ngacn.cc/read.php?tid=12943067


Q：需唔需要刷首抽架？
A：無首抽依回事，因為唔係抽返嚟，係可以直接用英雄自選卷換返嚟(新英除外)

Greetings, Raiders
This is GM Orvel.

We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on Thursday, 19th April 2018
Please find details below.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Maintenance Schedule]

Duration: Thurs, 19th April 2018
America Server: 01:00-06:00 (UTC -4)
Asia Server: 12:00-17:00 (UTC +7)
EU Server: 07:00-12:00 (UTC +2)

** Maintenance might end much earlier than listed maintenance time.

[Maintenance Details]

▶ New Costumes
- 2nd School Costumes (Season 2: 8 Heroes)
: Nyx, Cassandra, Mitra, Viska, Oddy, Annette, Mediana, Artemia

▶New Content
- Index system will be introduced
: ‘Index’ system will be added which will enable you to check various information about heroes
& monsters.
: You will be able to acquire various types of rewards based on collected Index.

▶Revamps & Adjustments
- Friendship Item crafting material tooltip revamp
- Stockade NPC ‘Nicky’ modeling revamp
- Portal Image revamp
- [Guide] will be added: [Multiplay Mode]
- May’s General Shop: New motion effect will be added upon item list reset
- Clause UW will be added to Beginner’s UW Ticket.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Some details might be changed during maintenance.
We will be back with more details with the Patch Note.

Thank you
GM Orvel

Dear Raiders
This is GM Orvel

Scheduled Maintenance has been successfully completed
Now you are able to access to the game.

[Maintenance Summary]
- 2nd Batch of School Costume Season 2
- King's Raid Index System
- Dragon Raid Event
- Consumed Arena Tickets sent (That were consumed due to Friendly Duel Bug)

[Known Issues]

:: iOS
- An issue where hero's profile in the Index is being displayed abnormally with serveral languages.
(Vietnamese, Portugese, German, Spanish)
- An issue where you cannot clear Index Achievement even after reaching 100%
- An issue where some heroes' titles are displayed abnormally
- An issue where long skill tooltip texts going over UI

:: AOS
- An issue where some long hero skill tooltips not being displayed

:: AOS & iOS
- An issue where you cannot grind a rune if you select it only one rune.
: It is working well. Just a display issue.

We will try to fix the known issues as soon as possible

Thank you
GM Orvel
